# AVExternalSyncDevice.DiscoverySession

**Class**

A means of discovering and monitoring connection / disconnection of external sync devices to the host.

## Declaration

```swift
class DiscoverySession
```

## Overview

[doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVExternalSyncDevice/DiscoverySession] is a singleton that lists the external sync devices connected to the host. The client is expected to key-value observe the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVExternalSyncDevice/DiscoverySession/devices] property for changes to the external sync devices list.

## Accessing the shared instance

- **shared**: The singleton instance of the external sync source device discovery session.
- **isSupported**: Whether external sync devices are supported by this device.

## Finding devices

- **devices**: An array of external sync devices connected to this host.

## External synchronization

- **AVExternalSyncDevice**: An external sync device connected to a host device that can be used to drive the timing of an internal component, such as a camera sensor.
- **AVExternalSyncDeviceDelegate**: Defines an interface for delegates of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDeviceInput] to respond to events that occur when connecting, calibrating, and disconnecting external sync devices.
- **AVExternalSyncDeviceStatus**: Connection state of an external sync device

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
